meanings: (절약하다) save (on), economize (on); (돈을) be thrifty, be frugal
(소중히 여기다) prize, value, treasure, cherish, hold (sth) dear
If you save something too much, it will become dung

vlive.korean: 나는 뭐 저녁이야... - 우리 애들이 먹는다는데 뭐 돈을 아낄 수가 있어? Dinner... - How can I think of money when it comes to our members? 듣기 View video BTS : 민슈가 생일 2일전💜
vlive.english: Dinner... - How can I think of money when it comes to our members?

vlive.korean: 아낄 줄 알아야 돼. Take care of yourself. 듣기 View video GOT7 : 잭슨의 "근육" 하드캐리해!
눈물을 아낄 줄 아는 그런 사람? But I am the person who can save tears? 듣기 View video NCT 127 : 잘가라또인가요~💚💚💚💚💚💚💚💚💚💚💚💚
vlive.english: But I am the person who can save tears?

vlive.korean: 우리 우정분들 아낄 사람 저밖에 없지 않아요? Don't UJUNG fans only have me to adore? 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [은서] HAA[은서]HAPPY EUNSEO DAY😍
vlive.english: Don't UJUNG fans only have me to adore?

vlive.korean: 아낄 줄 아는 사람이 되겠습니다. "and I will become a person who appreciates this group." 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : 찾았다! 오마이걸 제6화: 떠나라~!오마이걸 (최종화)
vlive.english: "and I will become a person who appreciates this group."

examples.korean: We don’t need to stint ourselves—have some more! 발음듣기 우린 아낄 필요 없어. 좀 더 먹어! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We don’t need to stint ourselves—have some more! 발음

examples.korean: They’re all for saving money where they can. 발음듣기 그들은 돈을 아낄 수 있을 때는 아껴야 한다고 굳게 믿고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They’re all for saving money where they can. 발음

examples.korean: She was impressed and I was happy that my insight saved the company money. 발음듣기 팀장은 깊은 인상을 받았고 저는 제 통찰력으로 회사의 경비를 아낄 수 있었던 점이 기뻤습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: She was impressed and I was happy that my insight saved the company money. 발음

examples.korean: You need to learn to be more thrifty[frugal]. 발음듣기 당신은 왜 아낄 줄을 모릅니까? Neungyule
examples.english: You need to learn to be more thrifty[frugal]. 발음

examples.korean: We can save two hours by taking the express. 발음듣기 급행열차를 타면 2시간을 아낄 수 있다[2시간 일찍 닿는다]. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We can save two hours by taking the express. 발음
